response.original_title: Enter the Haggis: Live at Lanigan's Ball
response.overview: Take five likeable blokes from Toronto, mix bagpipes, fiddles, electric guitars and a driving rhythm section. Toss in traditional Celtic tunes seasoned with bluegrass, rock 'n' roll -- and kilts. Our onto an open stage in front of an enthusiastic audience and you have the advent of a brand new style of music. An infectious hybrid of old and new. An experience you will long remember. It's time to Enter the Haggis! From that special evening comes a breakthrough concert sure to become the definitive Haggis performance.
response.tagline: Recorded at Plattsburgh State, Plattsburgh, NY
response.title: Enter the Haggis: Live at Lanigan's Ball
